post.body: yes, a cleaning job which I can fit around the girls and Dan's work - only 4 hours but better than nothing!
we miss you on plurk...
it worked as long as you're at the roundabout near morrison's in Perth :o)
I saw the pictures on twitpic and if I click the links - they're still there
was quite nice, not nearly as bad as last time! :D
my brain hasn't been in gear for a long time! Enjoy match we have youth fellowship at our house tonight.
think hellotxt might be playing up - got your germany spain one 3 times! ;)
but granny's looking after the children - aren't we meant to make the most of it?!? Thanks.
my daughter sweeping street! (Daddy been cutting hedge out front!) ;)
thats what I've got - nice decent slim phone!
glad you've come to that conclusion no your own! ;)
morning Judy
morning John
morning thomas
@caldjr ah well never mind
is filling in an application form
Is not looking forward to next 10 or so hours but is looking forward to getting home
sitting at Heysham ferry terminal waiting to go to the isle of man! Woo hoo!
had great fun thanks - cleaned up sick from the car seat again this morning! :)
is too tired
is off out to the cinema with her husband and no children. Thank goodness for granny's to babysit!
Is at muddy boots farm shop for lunch and some shopping
is at a ceilidh
is trying to work out how she's managed to melt a hole in the bottom of the microwave steriliser :(
oops just realised i'm signed in as carol-anne! Its dan here btw!!!! logging out and in again now!!
good morning twitterworld. At the corps this morning during playgroup. doing some more CtF prep. feeling a bit rough still but plodding on!
